projects.title: Groene Economie / Green Economics
projects.description:
Begin 2012 is het project ‘Groene Economie op de Utrechtse Heuvelrug’ van start gegaan. Dit project is een initiatief van Hogeschool Utrecht, Lectoraat Marketing, Marktonderzoek en Innovatie van lector Dr. Gerrita van der Veen.

Ondernemersverenigingen en bijna 20 bedrijven/ondernemers uit de regio werken samen aan de Utrechtse Heuvelrug als “Groene Economie”. Doel is te komen tot een gezamenlijke invulling van de Groene Economie gedachte om zo als regio onderscheidend te zijn. Er wordt gewerkt aan de invulling van een gezamenlijk merk voor ‘Groene Economie: Dit merk kan meerwaarde opleveren voor het bedrijfsleven. De ondernemersverenigingen en betrokken ondernemers hopen hiermee ook andere ondernemers te inspireren en innovatie te bevorderen. 

Partners:
WUR; UvA; Zakelijk Heuvelrug, Amerongse Ondernemers Vereniging, Gemeente Utrechtse Heuvelrug.

Organogram:

Controle & ondersteuning:

profile_positions.description:
Evytal® | Evytal Sports Management (ESM). As a progressive international sport management agency specialising in international football player management, we pride ourselves on providing comprehensive solutions tailored to the unique needs of both players and sports organisations. Our global network, extensive expertise, and years of experience enable us to offer unparalleled support and consultation to football players and football-related businesses seeking to enter the dynamic world of sports.

Situated in Europe with a presence in The Netherlands (HQ) & France, as well as in Africa-Uganda and Latin America-Brazil, we maintain a robust and ever-growing global network.

Evytal services: Sports business, strategic brand & marketing, management consult and operational assistance for sports organisations and projects; Full service athlete management (i.e. contracts / negotiations, transfers, player guidance, analyses); Football player scouting. 

Advisory support to foundation Ebenezer Soccer Academy in Uganda (Africa). 
Former Co-Founder to Escola Coxa Sumaré Brasil (Professional football school in Sumaré, Brasil - sold in 2019). 

www.evytal.com | hello@evytal.com 

Some function related responsibilities: General management; Finance; Brand strategy, development & communication; Marketing; Sponsorships; Sports business & agreements; Negotiations;  International partner relations. KNVB Registered Intermediary | Registered Intermediary Royal Dutch Football Association

profile_positions.description:
imPROOVment | management | www.improovment.com.
Label for brand strategy, brand management, marketing and media. Created and worked for brands in various branches as a brand strategist, brand and marketing director. 

Previously, over 11 years the holder of a record company, artist management & media marketing agency. Including A-label sponsorships / Award nominations /  International touring & record distribution. 

Previously strategy consultant partner for corporate clients of Novicell & Total Identity / Total Design.

Likeur en Jeneverfabriek Amsterdam™. De Hollandse Stokerij. Geraffineerde smaakmakers.

Likeur en Jeneverfabriek Amsterdam™ is part of The Golden Arch Distillery Amsterdam like Flacon de Cuisine™ and premium spirits brand Suigeneris®.
profile_positions.title: Executive Management Consultant | Business, Brand, Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Suigeneris®. We redefine taste™.

Suigeneris® is the Dutch distillery that holds a house of premium distilled beverages and brands. Suigeneris represents the finest resonating self-distilled spirits & liqueurs. Suigeneris celebrates the premium spirit brands Suigeneris® Vodka; Suigeneris® Rum; Suigeneris® Gin and the liqueurs brand Regin Amirūm®. 

The registered trademark Suigeneris is part of The Golden Arch Distillery, just as Flacon de Cuisine™ and Likeur & Jeneverfabriek Amsterdam™. 

Where can you purchase our spirit drinks? 
Retail & wholesale (b2b) can contact us via hello@houseofsuigeneris.com. It's available now! 
To all our spirit drinkers (b2c): Suigeneris spirits shall be available at the more expensive liquor stores & in the self-owned Suigeneris e-commerce store www.houseofsuigeneris.com per the beginning of November 2022. #suigeneris #housofsuigeneris #dutch distillery #weredefinetaste
-------
I manage independent services via Improovment - brands, marketing & media.  
Responsible for full brand & marketing strategy, brand tangibles development (from brandname to house style to e-commerce platform) of Suigeneris. Make Suigeneris® products stand-out: www.houseofsuigeneris.com.
profile_positions.title: Executive Management Consultant | Brand Strategy & Marketing (interim)

Role / Function

profile_positions.title: Partner (Independent) Brand Strategist, Management & Innovation

profile_positions.description:
We develop & license AI brand & audience behaviour software, advise on business innovations & develop custom AI-tech solutions. 

Powered by state-of-the-art and the latest innovations for Machine Learning, Brand Love intelligence™ developed Relevense™, the open, multi-connected ai-driven software that helps you really understand, reach and engage with your fanbase. It fosters awareness and engagement levels on social media by clear relevant inspiration, recommendations, insights &  advises on any of your brands or personal identity. Key: we know when your audience is receptive for your message. Plugin & API based. 

Brand Love intelligence has its own team of keen and dedicated software developers.

Key function(s): responsible for vision, strategic marketing / (pre)sales, finance (investments, governmental grants, tax), strategic partnerships, commercial propositions, stake holder communication, key projects, research & co-product development, etc.  

Secondly, active as expert on brand strategy & social media management irt research for Brand Love intelligent software development. Think of social behaviour / motivational (human drives), commercial, persuasive psychology vs content marketing based on purchase behaviour patterns (incentives) & brand Identity / appeal (preference) indications.

Relevense™ / Ambassador Connect™ / SureShotz™ / Data Axis™ / Powered by Brand Love intelligence™. We cross dimensions with AI & embrace the new!
profile_positions.title: Founder | Management

profile_positions.description:
WE are a strategic think tank with execution power. We focus on brand strategy, development & management. We love brands and are passionate about the multiple functionalities and diverse forces & dynamics brands can have for companies. WE position organizations and products and help them to become and stay reputable brands. From strategy to creation and vivid maintenance. Above and below the line media. 

I function under the WTP label as associate strategist / strategy director for various (international) companies, management consulting, creative brand agencies and independent high professionals teaming-up. I'm an interim strategist / strategy director for brand & change related subjects in various branches. I apply strategic thinking to strategy, brand development and brand leadership management programs in small, medium-sized and corporate settings. 

Former associate Total Identity / Total Design (Strategy & Change Director). 

Communication | Strategy | Marketing | Innovation.
profile_positions.title: Brand strategist / brand director

profile_positions.description:
As a part-time lecturer Sports Business Management & Marketing I'm committed to the well-accredited  international private institute Wittenborg University of Applied Sciences (partner of the University of Brighton, UK). Inspiring, educating and interacting with new smart sports business talent from across the world on sports business, management, marketing, law and media matters.

Sports Business Management | Global Sports Industry & Media | Strategic Change Management in Sports Business | Trademarks & Branding | Digital Marketing | Thesis Guidance.
profile_positions.title: Sports Management Lecturer
